file_related_requirements.description: Name of the supplier/vendor on invoice
file_related_requirements.rule: Must be Global People IT-Services GmbH

file_related_requirements.description: Address of the supplier on invoice

file_related_requirements.rule: Worker's name acceptable when company name not possible,
Same currency with clear exchange rate
Must be clearly stated on receipt
Must be actual tax receipts or invoices, not booking confirmations
Online copies sufficient, hard copy not required
Any personal information not required for reimbursement must be removed
Submit separate report for each trip using template
Must use Travel Expense Report Template Austria EUR.xlsx
Map with relevant route (Google Maps sufficient)
Record of kilometers traveled must be submitted
Parking tickets should be included within mileage payment

compliance_and_policies.description: General business expenses for job completion
compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Usually tax exempt, grossed up if not tax free
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - you must provide sufficient proof like tax receipts or invoices

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Follow specific tax allowances and rules
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - you must follow specific tax allowances found at government website
Receipt alone is not enough - you must get approval from your direct manager

compliance_and_policies.description: Private vehicles, motorbikes, bicycles for work
compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Maximum €0.42 per km, capped at €12,600 annually
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt is not applicable - you must provide map with route (Google Maps sufficient), record of kilometers, car details, and use travel template

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Should be included within mileage payment, taxed if paid separately
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - parking tickets should be included within mileage payment

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Maximum €30 per day (€2.50/hour for 3-12 hours), capped at €26.40 mentioned in document
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - you must use travel report template and cannot mix per diem with actual expenses

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Tax-free per diem covers meals, reduced by 50% if meals provided
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt is enough - per diem method covers meals

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Paid separately with proper invoice/receipt or €17 without receipt
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - provide proper invoice/receipt or accept €17 flat rate

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Per diem rates set by government for each destination
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - you must use travel report template and cannot mix per diem with actual expenses

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Tax-free based on government limits per destination, can be increased with receipts
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - for amounts above government rate, you must submit receipts

compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: If lunch and dinner provided, per diem reduced by two-thirds
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt is enough - automatic reduction applies

compliance_and_policies.description: Non-per diem expenses for international travel
compliance_and_policies.gross_up_rule: Expenses outside per diem paid against receipts
compliance_and_policies.additional_info_description: Receipt alone is not enough - you must provide receipts for expenses outside per diem
Cannot mix per diem method with actual expenses
